column3: [[1912]]) was a classmate of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] at [[King Edward's School]]
column4: and one of the [[T.C.B.S.]]. He was the first of Tolkien's friends to die (of illness); his place in the T.C.B.S. was taken over by [[Geoffrey Bache Smith]].

column1: * ''[[Tolkien and the Great War]]'' by [[John Garth]].
